Temple Spiders are a more powerful variant of deadly red spiders found in the eastern section of the Forthos Dungeon.

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Forthos Dungeon7521Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 66,175 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Temple Spider kill is worth 1,528.09.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
11 July 2019
(update)

Temple Spiders now drop red spiders' eggs in larger quantities.
